resources.string: One stop for all events, workshops, College programming contest results. This app includes features to share all details regarding events and workshops that are going to be conducted in our college. It helps also gives a one stop destination for all societies and groups in college to promote their events easily.
You can filter out events with respect to societies. To see the past events, there\'s a Past Event section. Registrations for the workshop/events can be done within in the app through webview.
